ModMetaData.name: Mechstrider Mechanoid Slag
ModMetaData.author: Zergologist
ModMetaData.description: Have you felt the need for your Biotech mech debris to de-bris consistent? Bad joke, I know. This little patch will make turn your mechstrider drop the new Mechanoid Slag Chunks upon destruction, which are for all intents and purposes identical to steel slag chunks, just with the mechanoid detritus shapes instead of the generic steel slag.
